Name: patient_cohort
Description: Cohort 1,  previously used samples; Cohort 2, newly added samples

Name: sample_origin
Description: BPTB: Barts Pancreas Tissue Bank; ESP: Spanish National Cancer Research Centre; LIV: Liverpool University;UCL: University College

Name: diagnosis
Description: 1 = control, 2 = benign hepatobiliary disease; 3 = Pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma, i.e. pancreatic cancer

Name: stage
Description: For those with pancratic cancer, what stage was it? One of IA, IB, IIA, IIIB, III, IV

Name: benign_sample_diagnosis
Description: For those with a benign, non-cancerous diagnosis, what was the diagnosis?

Name: plasma_CA19_9
Description: Blood plasma levels of CA 19â€“9 monoclonal antibody that is often elevated in patients with pancreatic cancer.

Name: LYVE1
Description: Urinary levels of Lymphatic vessel endothelial hyaluronan receptor 1, a protein that may play a role in tumor metastasis

Name: REG1B
Description: Urinary levels of a protein that may be associated with pancreas regeneration.

Name: TFF1
Description: Urinary levels of Trefoil Factor 1, which may be related to regeneration and repair of the urinary tract

Name: REG1A
Description: Urinary levels of a protein that may be associated with pancreas regeneration.
